name: Dark Cloak
description: Shroud yourself in protective shadow to heal for 1472 every 1 second, over 3 seconds.  This portion of the ability scales off your Max Health.  You gain Minor Protection for 10 seconds, reducing your damage taken by 5%.
effectLines: No longer grants invisibility. Now heals over time based on Max Health, and grants Minor Protection.
coefDescription: Shroud yourself in protective shadow to heal for $1 every 1 second, over 3 seconds.  This portion of the ability scales off your Max Health.  You gain Minor Protection for 10 seconds, reducing your damage taken by 5%.
